markdown:
<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Dero Strangler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=106)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Dero stranglers specialize in capturing living victims, and they are often called upon to aid in abductions.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Dero Strangler](/Monsters.aspx?ID=106)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Dero" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=214" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 84</row>

**Perception** +6; darkvision

**Languages**
[Aklo](/Languages.aspx?ID=13), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +11, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +4, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +10

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +3

**Con** +3

**Int** +0

**Wis** -1

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Aklys](/Weapons.aspx?ID=85), [Rope](/Equipment.aspx?ID=44) (50 feet), [Hand Crossbow](/Weapons.aspx?ID=69) (10 bolts), [Lethargy Poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120) (5 doses)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +10 

**Ref** +8 

**Will** +6 

</row>

**HP** 45

**Immunities**
[confusion](/Conditions.aspx?ID=5)

**Weaknesses**
vulnerable to sunlight

**Vulnerable to Sunlight** A dero strangler takes 8 damage for every hour they're exposed to sunlight.

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 20 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
aklys +11 ([Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
aklys +10 ([Ranged Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=251), [Tethered](/Traits.aspx?ID=252), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+6 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hand crossbow +10 ([range increment 60 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=248), [reload 1](/Traits.aspx?ID=254)),
**Damage** 1d6+2 piercing plus [lethargy poison](/Equipment.aspx?ID=120)

**Occult Innate Spells** DC 19
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Ghost Sound](/Spells.aspx?ID=132)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59) (at will), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292)

**Strangle** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Attack](/Traits.aspx?ID=15), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)) **Requirement** The dero must have two free hands, or be wielding an aklys and have one hand free. **Effect** The dero attempts an [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) check to Grab with a +2 circumstance bonus. On a success, the target takes 1d6+6 bludgeoning damage. Double the damage on a critical success.

</column>

<document level="2" id="creature-family-29" />
name: Dero Strangler
